name: RINA RhythmERROR
description:
RINA: RhythmERROR is a retro electronic style rhythm game.
BOSS fight, musical performance, anime girl? All together.
Different from traditional rhythm games, RhythmERROR will bring a complete story to the players, more like an adventure.
Where there is adventure, there is battle. Here, even if you don't good at the rhythm, survival is also victory~
Never played a rhythm game? It doesn't matter! ヾ(❛ᴗ ˂ ) ♥
『Game features』
♥ The unique music experience of rhythm game+BOSS fight.
♥ Super special feature tracks, rich in types from retro to electronic styles (will be updated continuously in the future~)
♥ Deliberately designed anime "ERROR girl" roles with different personalities (don't be lenient with BOSS~)
♥ With the exploration of the game, what is the real face of lovely Rina?
♥ Multiple difficulties can be adapted to meet the needs of casual and hard core players.
If you are interested,you can access the steam page to find more.
